text: I speak up confidently in team meetings to share my ideas.
I take the lead when starting new projects or initiatives.
I prefer to wait for others to take charge rather than stepping forward myself.
I make decisions quickly and stand by them.
I advocate directly for resources or support when my team needs them.
Under pressure, I become more vocal and directive with my team.
When deadlines are tight, I hesitate to make bold decisions.
During crises, I step up to organize and guide others.
When things go wrong, I withdraw rather than taking charge.

I challenge ideas or approaches that I believe are incorrect.
I avoid confrontation even when I disagree with a decision.
When stressed, I become more passive and less willing to voice my opinion.

I naturally take responsibility for outcomes, even when they involve others.
I enjoy building relationships with colleagues across different teams.
I prefer working independently rather than collaborating with others.
